items.sentence: Tom told Mary that he wanted to visit Australia.
Tom told Mary that she should go to the dentist.
Tom told everybody he wanted to become a barber.
Tom is sitting alone under that tree over there.
Tom said he thought that the room was too small.
Both Tom and Mary are award-winning journalists.
Tom doesn\'t like summer. He says it\'s too hot.
I didn\'t realize that Tom used to be a teacher.
Tom said he would buy something for Mary to eat.
Tom said it was too late to change his schedule.
